DOC.brief_summary: Prospective, observational study to collect and analyze data on patients with advanced hormone dependent prostate cancer treated with Firmagon® according to routine medical practice in Argentina
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness and Safety of Firmagon® in Androgen Ablative Therapy of Advanced Hormone-dependent Prostate Carcinoma in Argentina
DOC.criteria: Advanced Prostate Cancer patients to be treated with Firmagon in the context of usual clinical practice Written informed consent Contraindications to Firmagon Patients already on Firmagon therapy
